poem.title: From a Louse
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Great poet o the puddin race! Get that grin aff your pin-up face. To harbour me is no disgrace For any lady: It's rare to pioneer a place No ploughed already! 'Tae see oursels as others see us'? That's common sense. That's the police - Hauf blin (take that fae one wi feelers In the back o's heid). Crazed banes! I hear your thin blood wheeze You'll soon be deid.
